name: deep-basic-backend
description: DEEP: Basic Backend - This project is a simple Express.js repository designed to serve as a training ground for mastering fundamental backend concepts. Whether you're new to backend development or looking to reinforce your skills, this educational resource provides hands-on experience with Express.js, showcasing best practices in creating APIs, routing, middleware usage, and more. Dive into the world of server-side development with this practical learning repository.
